# Get: `get`
The get module contains functions to extract information from the
AnnData object.

## Data Extraction
```{eval-rst}
.. module:: dotools_py.get
.. currentmodule:: dotools_py

.. autosummary::
    :toctree: generated

    get.expr
    get.mean_expr
    get.log2fc
    get.pcts_cells
    get.dge_results
```

